text: @Mike_Pence @realDonaldTrump In the fourth year, he mishandled the coronavirus response, unemployment rose to 14%,  gassed his people for a photo op, had the national guard arrest and terrorize peacefully protesters, GDP dropped by 32% and caused the death of over 155,000 Americans.  Good job
